name: Heimdall 2
description: Heimdall 2 (also known as Heimdall 2: into the Hall of Worlds) is an isometric action-adventure video game developed by The 8th Day and published by Core Design for Amiga, Amiga CD32 and MS-DOS platforms in 1994. It is set in a world based on Norse mythology and is the sequel to Heimdall, released in 1992. The CD-ROM versions contain a CD audio soundtrack composed by Martin Iveson.
